questions.question: Find the exterior angle of a regular octagon.

questions.question: What is the diagonal of a square with side 5 cm?
questions.svg: <svg width="160" height="160" viewBox="0 0 160 160"><rect x="30" y="30" width="100" height="100" fill="#FCE7F3" stroke="#EC4899" stroke-width="2"/><line x1="30" y1="30" x2="130" y2="130" stroke="#EC4899" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/><text x="80" y="145" text-anchor="middle" font-size="12" fill="#374151">5 cm</text><text x="90" y="75" font-size="12" fill="#EF4444">?</text></svg>
questions.hint: Use Pythagorean theorem: d² = s² + s² = 2s²
